Cluster.Pseudo.Notification.CreationFail: Could not connect the cluster. Check the connection settings or try again later.
Cluster.SwitchPage.Header.Title: Child cluster
Cluster.SwitchPage.Text.WrongCluster: To perform these actions, switch to the central cluster.
Cluster.ListPage.Header.Title: Clusters
Cluster.ListPage.Hint.DeleteCluster: You cannot delete a cluster selected on another interface page
Cluster.ListPage.Text.EmptyResult: There are no clusters connected yet.
Cluster.DetailsPage.Header.Title: Cluster
Cluster.CreatePage.Header.Title: Connecting a cluster
Cluster.CreatePage.RegistryForm.Hint.Add: You can specify the address of the Runtime Radar image repository. Leave empty if you want to use ghcr.io/runtime-radar.
Cluster.CreatePage.DataBaseForm.Hint.Int: This option is recommended for pilot implementations, superficial testing, or for loads of up to 100 events per second.
Cluster.CreatePage.DataBaseForm.Hint.Ext: This option is recommended for standard or high loads.
Cluster.CreatePage.DataBaseForm.Hint.Tls: Data will be encrypted before transfer
Cluster.CreatePage.DataBaseForm.Hint.Che: The existing Runtime Radar certificate will be used
Contents of the <certificateFile> section of the /etc/clickhouse-server/config.xml file
Contents of the ssl_ca_file section of the /etc/postgresql/postgresql.conf file
Contents of the tls-ca-cert-file section of the /etc/redis/redis.conf file
Cluster.CreatePage.DataBaseForm.Hint.Per: Data will be retained when the component restarts
Cluster.CreatePage.DataBaseForm.Hint.Sto: Leave the box empty if you want to use the default storage space class or get the class from the administrator or by executing the kubectl get storageclasses command
Cluster.CreatePage.RabbitForm.Hint.Inter: This option is recommended for pilot implementations, superficial testing, or for loads of up to 100 events per second.
Cluster.CreatePage.RabbitForm.Hint.Exter: This option is recommended for standard or high loads.
Cluster.CreatePage.RabbitForm.Hint.Persi: Data will be retained when the component restarts
Cluster.CreatePage.RabbitForm.Hint.Stora: Leave the box empty if you want to use the default storage space class or get the class from the administrator or by executing the kubectl get storageclasses command
Cluster.CreatePage.IngressForm.Label.Ing: Set up access to Runtime Radar via Ingress
Cluster.CreatePage.IngressForm.Hint.Ingr: Leave the box empty if you want to use the default class name or get the class from the administrator or by executing the kubectl get ingressclass command
Cluster.CreatePage.IngressForm.Hint.Host: Traffic will be redirected to this address
Cluster.CreatePage.IngressForm.Placehold: Starts with "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----" and ends with "-----END CERTIFICATE-----"
Starts with "-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----" and ends with "-----END PRIVATE KEY-----"
Cluster.CreatePage.IngressForm.Label.Nod: Set up access to Runtime Radar via NodePort
Cluster.CreatePage.AccessForm.Hint.Proxy: This can be specified if Runtime Radar is installed in a network segment isolated from the internet
Cluster.CreatePage.AccessForm.Hint.Centr: The child cluster will use this address for connection
Cluster.CreatePage.AccessForm.Error.OwnC: A cluster with this address already exists
Cluster.CreatePage.AccessForm.Label.Name: Namespace
Cluster name
Cluster.CreatePage.AccessForm.Hint.Name: This will be displayed in the list of all clusters
Cluster.DeleteModal.Title.Unregistered: Delete the as yet not installed cluster?
Cluster.DeleteModal.Text.Unregistered: The cluster will be deleted permanently.
Cluster.DeleteModal.Text.Registered: Deleting the installed cluster also deletes the cluster-related events. It is recommended that you first back up the database. To delete the cluster, copy the command, and execute it in the command-line interface.
Cluster.DeleteModal.Notification.Text.Co: Failed to get the deletion command. Try again shortly.
